thread.title: Great service
thread.title_full: Great service - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rupal A
title: Great service
text:
My husband and I stayed one night.
The hotel is conveniently located in Times Square. The bus terminal was not an issue. The staff is polite and courteous. Melinda was our waitress at breakfast was eager to help and get anything we requested. My husband likes bran flakes and as there were non on the cereal dispenser, Melinda went and got a bowl full for us.
The breakfast had everything from eggs,bacon, to fruit, waffles and hot and cold cereals among many other choices. We would definitely stay again.
